TypeSignature.Value: public delegate void AddingNewEventHandler(object sender, AddingNewEventArgs e);
.class public auto ansi sealed AddingNewEventHandler extends System.MulticastDelegate
Public Delegate Sub AddingNewEventHandler(sender As Object, e As AddingNewEventArgs)
public delegate void AddingNewEventHandler(System::Object ^ sender, AddingNewEventArgs ^ e);
type AddingNewEventHandler = delegate of obj * AddingNewEventArgs -> unit

param.name: sender
param.span: 事件的源，通常为数据容器或数据绑定集合。

span.span: The source of the event, typically a data container or data-bound collection.
A that contains the event data.

summary.span: 表示用来处理 事件的方法。

span.span: Represents the method that will handle the event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 事件发生之前将新项添加到集合，通常在数据绑定方案中。The event occurs prior to adding a new item to a collection, typically in data-binding scenarios. 此事件的处理程序可以提供要添加新项重写的集合类的标准操作。The handler of this event can supply the new item to be added, overriding the standard action of the collection class. 这可以通过设置的属性参数`e`为这个新项。This is accomplished by setting the property of the parameter `e` to this new item. 通常，此项必须为收件人集合所要求的类型或集合将引发异常的类型。Typically this item must be of a type expected by the recipient collection, or the collection will throw an exception of type . 此事件常用在类中的数据绑定方案，如和。This event is commonly used in data-binding scenarios, within classes such as and . 创建 委托时，需要标识将要处理该事件的方法。When you create an delegate, you identify the method that will handle the event. 若要将事件与事件处理程序关联，请将该委托的一个实例添加到事件中。To associate the event with your event handler, add an instance of the delegate to the event. 除非移除了该委托，否则每当发生该事件时就会调用事件处理程序。The event handler is called whenever the event occurs, unless you remove the delegate. 有关事件处理程序委托的详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about event-handler delegates, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用委托来处理事件。The following code example demonstrates how to use the delegate to handle the event. 此代码示例摘自[如何： 使用 Windows 窗体 BindingSource 自定义项添加](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/how-to-customize-item-addition-with-the-windows-forms-bindingsource.md)。This code example is part of a larger example provided in [How to: Customize Item Addition with the Windows Forms BindingSource](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/how-to-customize-item-addition-with-the-windows-forms-bindingsource.md). [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.DataConnector.AddingNew#8](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataConnector.AddingNew/CPP/form1.cpp#8)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.DataConnector.AddingNew#8](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataConnector.AddingNew/CS/form1.cs#8)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.DataConnector.AddingNew#8](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataConnector.AddingNew/VB/form1.vb#8)]
